body_html:
@alextp I am afraid that you mis-understand our questions. What siyu tried to point out here is that for the same Variable stuff(in the if branch it is a normal Variable op, while in the else branch it is a ResourceVariableOp), in our understanding, either Variable op or ResourceVariable op should have the same initialization value, otherwise ,that is a inconsistency. Could please kindly take a further look at our questions before closing it?

Thanks
